name: An Experimental Fighting Game Called :>
description:
Red Controls:

Left Kick - Q

Right Kick - E

Boost - W

Blue Controls: 

Left Kick - Left Arrow Key

Right Kick - Right Arrow Key

Boost - Down Arrow Key

R to restart

A little side project that came out of me just messing around with stuff in unity. Very unpolished and I don't think I'll ever update it but I think it can be kinda fun. :>
